profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs
products: Interior Painting,Exterior Painting,Residential Painting and Commercial Painting,Staircase refinishing, Condo or Apartment Renovations and Handyman Services, Kitchen Design and Build, Home Additions, Structural work, Garage Design and Build, Basement Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Basement Underpinning and Waterproofing,Custom Cabinetry, Flooring Installation including, Laminate, Hardwood, Engineered, Tiles, Including Porcelain, marble and granite. We also have Master Electricians, Master Plumbers and Gas and HVAC members as a part of our team.
services: House Painters, Office Painting, Exterior Painting, Residential Painting, Wallpaper Installation & Removal, Stucco Removal, Drywall Installation and Plaster repairs, Paint & Wallpaper Retailer save up to 50% off, Demolition, Rough and Finished Carpentry, Home and Renovation advisors, Kitchen Planning and Design, Handyman and Painter for a Day Services, Deck Design and Build, Basement renovations, general contractors
brands: Benjamin Moore, Dulux Paint, and Sherwin Williams. We Believe in not Including Paint and providing you our wholesale Paint Pricing as many of our Competitors include paint in your pricing and then substitute low grade paint. We believe in provide you the best paint for your home and to provide access to our unbelievable wholesale pricing.
specialities: Custom painting, Stucco removal, staircase refinishing and rebuilding,wallpaper installation, wallpaper removal, handyman services, home renovations including bathroom renovations, basement renovations & condo and apartment renovations. Plus our Award Winning Painter and Handyman for a Day Services. Our Painting Services including Kitchen Cabinet Painting and Spraying are specialties. Kitchen Design Services and Complete Kitchen Design, Build and Installation.
payment_method: Cash, Cheques, Email Transfers, all Major Credit Cards

profile: Mold Detection & Removal If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your family’s health and well-being. At mri-mold.ca it’s our job to ensure you are provided with an accurate assessment and appropriate resolution to maintain a safe and healthy environment.
service_area:
Toronto and the GTA
Brampton, Richmond Hill, Thornhill, Markham, Newmarket, Whitby, Ajax, Pickering, Oshawa, Mississauga, King City, Vaughan, Concord, Oakville, Milton and Caledon, Kitchener, Waterloo, Guelph
products: All products used are green and non hazardous.  In addition, they are approved by the IICRC for mold remediation.
services: Mold Inspection, Mold Removal, Air Quality Testing, Mold Testing, Asbestos Testing, Handyman Services, Fire and Flood Damage and Restoration in residential homes, commercial properties and pleasure crafts (motor and sail boats), Sanitization/Decontamination Services
brands: Only the best products and brands are used by mold.ca.  We work with professional Mold remediation suppliers.
specialities: Researching and employing the most up to date mold remediation practices in the industry. In addition, we have been assisting in the remediation of imported sea containers, sailboats/power boats and Condo/Apartment heating/cooling unit remediation.

profile:
Here at FV RENOVATIONS, we offer very competitive rates for our elite services.With customer satisfaction being our main priority, we pride ourselves in the belief that our job is not complete until our customers are fully satisfied.
​
At FV RENOVATIONS, we strive to excel in our service. So when you hire us, you can be confident that you will receive the personal touch that only our skilled team can offer.
 
OFFERING UNBEATABLE PRICES FOR TOP-QUALITY SERVICE

At FV RENOVATIONS, customer satisfaction is the ultimate responsibility of all our employees.
Our commitment is to provide excellent services that will excel far beyond your expectations.By maintaining strong and friendly communication with our customers,
we continue to enhance the value and quality of our work to ensure you are completely satisfied.
 
 
Client satisfaction is not just a goal for us - it is an action plan in progress.
​
We don’t just believe in it - we live by it!  
 
FV RENOVATIONS -"QUALITY IS OUR STANDARD"

profile: Welcome to Man Power Demolition. We are Ontario's Leader in Deconstruction! We specialize in residential, commercial and industrial projects - Full demolition guts, selective deconstruction as well as abatement services. We provide free consultations and onsite estimates and are fully licensed and certified for demolition by Ontario standards. We also provide disposal services for our own customers. Contact us today to schedule your appointment. At Manpower Demolition our customers wants and employee safety comes first. We are licensed and our reviews speaks for themselves. Call us today.

profile:
Toronto's demolition experts!
Acez Demolition has been locally owned and operated for many years. 

Acez Demolition provides demolition services to Toronto, Markham, Thornhill, Woodbridge, Vaughan, Milton, York and North York. 
We are licensed and insured to provide demolition in Toronto and surrounding cities. 

We take great pride in providing outstanding customer service. 
We strive to have complete customer satisfaction with each project we complete and we are committed to get your project done professionally and safely. We take pride in our work, reliability and the fact that our customers have been with us for many years. We work with both contractors and homeowners.

We have expertise with residential, commercial and industrial structural demolition, which includes house demolition, garage demolition, etc.

We have expertise with residential, commercial and industrial structural demolition, which includes house demolition, garage demolition, home demolition and other building demolition projects. 
We recycle as much of the demolition material as possible. We’ll take the time to explain the demolition process and answer any questions that you may have.
We gut interiors such as full house bathrooms , kitchens , basements, removing back walls of homes to make way for additions and new foundations, take roofs off to allow for 2nd and 3rd floor additions.

Give us a call - (416) 894-4026
specialities: Residential Demolition | Commercial Demolition | Industrial Demolition

AK home star builders
A name you can trust. 
Building Solid, Beautiful & Unique Living Spaces in Toronto 
AK Home Star builders serving GTA and surrounding area for more than 15 years with its professional crew. The Company has been taking major design and build, renovation, and remodeling projects. profile:
At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We are transparent with your project from start to finish, ensuring that the final product meets your expectations. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.

profile:
Aura-Con is a Toronto based construction company that specializes in Demolition, Excavation, Foundation and Shoring Solutions. Our services include demolition of low-rise to mid-rise structures, site preparation and earthworks, bulk and detailed excavation for residential, commercial and industrial buildings. We specialize in variety of foundation and Shoring solutions such as Soldier Piles & Lagging, Caisson Walls, Structural Caissons, Sheet Piling, Underpinning, Tiebacks and Soil Anchors. At Aura-Con we have highly knowledgeable and experienced personnel at all levels of the company. Our extensive experience allows us to provide value engineering and high-quality service to our clients.

Aura-Con is equipped with a broad range of specialized equipment and highly skilled operators, which enables us to complete projects with optimal performance. Safety is our priority; we have a comprehensive safety program and safety training for all our employees. We ensure a safe work environment throughout all our projects. Aura-Con is uniquely positioned to provide value to its clients by combining Demolition, Shoring Solutions, and Excavation services thus increasing efficiency and productivity. Every project is completed with our clients needs at the forefront, providing communication, reliability and integrity.
products: Aura-Con is a Toronto based construction company that specializes in Demolition, Excavation, Foundation and Shoring Solutions.
services:
Demolition 
Excavation 
Shoring Systems 
Foundation Work
Underpinning
